Bhagvan would always be invited for the Temple Festival Inauguration. He would be asked to pull the iron chain for starting the Temple car. As long as Bhagwan was physically fit, he attended these functions without fail.
 Please follow the [link](https://youtu.be/pw6zlcrN77A?si=KSjoBjADtunYS-NF) for the satsang in youtube.
